summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rezvo booking app iteration 6. All new features verified working: Team member CRUD APIs, Password reset flow APIs, Calendar team view API, Booking with team member API. Frontend dashboard, calendar, and bookings pages all functional. Mobile screens (ForgotPasswordScreen, TeamScreen, CalendarScreen) properly implemented.
passed_tests: GET /api/team-members/{id} - Get single team member (200 OK)
POST /api/bookings/with-team - Create booking with team member (200 OK)
Landing page loads with Rezvo branding and cookie consent
Mobile preview page loads with Client/Business mode toggle
Expo QR page loads with QR code and test credentials
Login flow - form submission redirects to dashboard
Dashboard displays stats (0 today, Â£105.00 revenue, 8 total, 100% show rate)
Calendar page loads with week view and bookings displayed
Calendar shows team member bookings (Emma Wilson, Sarah Johnson, etc.)
Add Booking modal opens with service, date, time, client fields
Bookings page shows 8 total bookings with search and status filter
critical_code_review_comments: Mobile screens (ForgotPasswordScreen, TeamScreen, CalendarScreen) are well-implemented with proper API integration
Team member color coding is properly implemented in both backend and mobile screens
Calendar team view endpoint returns proper structure with team_members, bookings_by_member, and services
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_team_and_auth.py (new test file for team and auth features)
seed_data_creation: Test team members created during testing are cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features from iteration 6 tested and working: Team member CRUD (POST/GET/PATCH/DELETE /api/team-members), Password reset flow (forgot-password, verify-reset-code, reset-password), Calendar team view (/api/calendar/team-view), Booking with team assignment (/api/bookings/with-team). Mobile screens exist at /app/mobile/rezvo-mobile/src/screens/ - ForgotPasswordScreen.js, VerifyCodeScreen.js, ResetPasswordScreen.js, business/TeamScreen.js, business/CalendarScreen.js. All APIs are live - no mocked endpoints.

team_members_api.create: Working - POST /api/team-members creates member with name, email, phone, role, color, service_ids
team_members_api.list: Working - GET /api/team-members returns array of active members
team_members_api.get_single: Working - GET /api/team-members/{id} returns member details with working_hours
team_members_api.stats: Working - GET /api/team-members/{id}/stats returns booking and revenue stats

password_reset_api.forgot_password: Working - POST /api/auth/forgot-password sends reset code email
password_reset_api.verify_code: Working - POST /api/auth/verify-reset-code validates code and returns reset_token
password_reset_api.reset_password: Working - POST /api/auth/reset-password updates password with valid token

calendar_team_view_api.response_structure: Returns date, team_members array, bookings_by_member object, services array

booking_with_team_api.features: Creates booking with optional team_member_id assignment

mobile_screens.ForgotPasswordScreen: Implemented - email input, sends reset code, navigates to VerifyCode
mobile_screens.TeamScreen: Implemented - list members, add/edit/delete, color picker, service assignment
mobile_screens.CalendarScreen: Implemented - team columns, color-coded bookings, add booking with team selection

web_frontend.landing_page: Working - Rezvo branding, hero section, cookie consent
web_frontend.mobile_preview: Working - shows mobile app preview with Client/Business toggle
web_frontend.expo_qr: Working - QR code for Expo Go testing
web_frontend.dashboard: Working - stats, today's schedule, smart tips, navigation
web_frontend.calendar: Working - week view, bookings displayed, Add Booking modal
web_frontend.bookings: Working - list view with search and status filter
